flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Convert your PicooZ to a 2.4ghz 4 channel miniature rc helicopter using off-the-shelf rc parts. Cyclic control is achieved through the use of two small magnetic actuators one for the aileron control and the other one for the elevator control. We will be using any standard servo boards as actuator drivers so that any 4 channel receiver (the lightest you can get) would work without any additional PIC or microcontroller programming.
